attributes.action: allow students with learning difficulties or disabilities free transport to school after the age of 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the location of special needs colleges and schools, transport is essential with some students unable to use public transport. As school leaving age is likely to increase to 18, it is unfair to ask students to pay when there are no local special needs alternatives for higher education.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow students with learning difficulties or disabilities free transport to school after the age of 16."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13534.asp
